name: Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game
description:
Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game
is a casual singleplayer puzzle game, that plays like a one-man board game and doubles as a cinematic experience when switching between cameras.
Use the computer mouse to click and drag the given items, tools and teleporters to plan a perfect path ahead for your spaceship to safely reach the end portal.

Use buttons to navigate your spaceship
The spaceship is controlled by buttons that determine whether your spaceship will turn right or left, or even shoot a rocket straight ahead. It's up to you to place them correctly.


Use teleporters to avoid obstacles

Teleporters enable you to reach places beyond the initial level borders and you can use them to change the direction of your spaceship in otherwise impossible ways.


Collect all the crystals
To complete a level it is required to collect all crystals. You can pick these up either by flying into them or shooting them.


Additional Information
The game has extra tools in the settings to account for difficulty with associating the colors of some items to their respective actions.
